translations: 把……说得一文不值；（非正式）严厉批评（rubbish 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: She is often accused of rubbishing her opponent.
sentences.translation: 她经常因诋毁对手而受到指责。

sentences.sentence: Whatever you do in this industry will have your competitors rubbishing you.
sentences.translation: 无论你在这个行业做了什么都将让你的竞争对手瞧不起你。

sentences.sentence: He admitted he felt very strange to be honored by a country whose rugby team he has spent a lifetime rubbishing.
sentences.translation: 大卫·坎皮斯一生的时间都在贬低英国的橄榄球队，而这个国家却给了他如此殊荣，他承认自己也感到很奇怪。
